alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Morgan; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 19 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Elliott and Rowan. In southeast Kentucky, Morgan. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1014 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms has come to an end but runoff continues. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... West Liberty, Wrigley, Blairs Mills, Blaze, Pomp, Leisure, Yocum, Lick Branch, Lenox, Licking River, Minor, Hamm and Wagner. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
